snippet: A deadly form of a common childhood illness has been linked to many of the mysterious child deaths that have occurred in Cambodia, health officials said Monday.
abstract: Lab tests have confirmed that a virulent strain of hand, foot and mouth disease known as EV-71 is to blame for many of the mysterious child deaths in Cambodia.
lead_paragraph: A deadly form of a common childhood illness has been linked to many of the mysterious child deaths that have occurred in Cambodia, health officials said Monday.

headline.main: Cambodia: Child Deaths Linked to Virus
headline.print_headline: Cambodia: Child Deaths Linked to Virus
